Description.description: This will link Contacts with Sessions. Either through self signup via the Portal or by invitation via Dynamics.
Unique identifier of the user who created the record.
Date and time when the record was created.
Unique identifier of the delegate user who created the record.
Unique identifier for entity instances
The number of days the contact attended the Session
Indicates a candidate to be considered as a backup candidate for the session if required.
The fee that will be paid to the contact for the session. Calculated from the Role's rate for active Assignments and from the stored local Rate for inactive Assignments for historical accuracy.
Value of the Calculated Fee in base currency.
The Contact added to the Session
Set to Yes If Contact SIN is populated
Set to Yes If Contact SIN is populated
The system generated Contract number combining Fiscal Year and Contract Sequence
The system generated sequenc number to be used on a Contract
Select Yes if payments need to be sent by Cheque back to the Ministry
Select Yes if payments need to be sent by Cheque back to the Ministry
System set date when the Expense Authority approves the Assignment Contract
The user that approved the Assignment Contract
System set behind the scenes flag to record when Expense Fee record has been created via Workflow. Ensures Fee record is not created twice.
System set behind the scenes flag to record when Expense Fee record has been created via Workflow. Ensures Fee record is not created twice.
Manually entered fee if fee is not tied to attendance and role
Value of the Inclusive Fee in base currency.
The name of the assignment. It will be system set with the name Contact Last Name - Session Name.
The rate to be used to calculate the Fee. System set when a Role is added to the Assignement
Value of the Rate in base currency.
The Role the Contact will have for the session. Will impact the Fee total
Value of the Role Rate in base currency.
The session the contact is part of
Records if the contact required a ToC (Teacher on Call) to attend the session. Will impact Fee calculations
Records if the contact required a ToC (Teacher on Call) to attend the session. Will impact Fee calculations
The number of days the ToC was required for the session
The primary email address for the entity.
Exchange rate for the currency associated with the entity with respect to the base currency.
Sequence number of the import that created this record.
Unique identifier of the user who modified the record.
Date and time when the record was modified.
Unique identifier of the delegate user who modified the record.
Date and time that the record was migrated.
Owner Id
Unique identifier for the business unit that owns the record
Unique identifier for the team that owns the record.
Unique identifier for the user that owns the record.
Contains the id of the process associated with the entity.
Contains the id of the stage where the entity is located.
Status of the Assignment
Status of the Assignment
Reason for the status of the Assignment
Reason for the status of the Assignment
For internal use only.
Unique identifier of the currency associated with the entity.
A comma separated list of string values representing the unique identifiers of stages in a Business Process Flow Instance in the order that they occur.
Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.
